apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with a heart emoji portrays two individuals, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a standard, no-skin-tone hue, united by a prominent, glossy red heart. The figures are designed with Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, giving them a friendly and approachable appearance. The heart, glowing with realistic lighting, signifies love, connection, and partnership between any two people, making this emoji a versatile expression of affection and unity on Apple devices.
